content: In a tournament bracket with 36 teams, how many games must be played to determine a winner?
subject: Thinking Skills
explanation: In a single-elimination tournament, each game eliminates exactly one team. To eliminate 35 teams (leaving 1 winner), exactly 35 games are needed.
